transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Good morning Jitender bhai, Armaan baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Hello, good morning, Armaan bhai, aapka account manager.
Customer: Kaise ho Jitender bhai?
Executive: Badhiya.
Customer: Jitender bhai aapko ek concern raise hua tha lead ko leke, buyleads ko leke.
Executive: Ji?
Executive: Ha, buyleads ke liye concern raise kiya tha na aapne, buyleads ke thik nahi aa raha hai, fake vagera is tarike se.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ha, to maine aapko number bhi diya tha ki number save rakhiyega, aah, aah, kariyega. To jab bhi aapko koi bhi challenges aata hai na is tarike ka, to aap apne account manager ko mujhe hi directly message kar liya kare.
Executive: Thik hai? Jisse mai usko resolve kara dungi. Actually multiple, multiples time maine connect karne ki koshish ki. In between aur last time bhi meri meeting, I think aap beech me se chale gaye the jab mai aapko guide kar raha tha.
Executive: Yaad hai aapko? Jab meri meeting hui thi aapke sath.
Executive: To us time proper aap nahi, aah, samajh paye the chizo ko aur aap beech me se meeting cut karke chale gaye the. Maine aapko pucha bhi tha sir kab connect kar le dobara? Kyuki abhi meeting pura nahi hua hai.
Executive: To usi regarding jo buyleads ka issues aa rahe hai, usi ke regarding mujhe discuss karna tha aur wo aapka, aapko resolution provide karane me kaise wo behtar hoga buyleads ka. Jo aap bol rahe hai na fake wala, fake concern. To mai aapko ek bar on video meet laake wo sari chize ek bar discuss kar leta hu.
Executive: Jaha pe aapko behtar resolution de saku, usse aur improve kara saku chizo ko.
Executive: To mai aapko video meet schedule kar raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapko usme kya bataunga aapko?
Executive: Usme mai aapko bataunga ki buyleads kaun sa uthana hai. Thik hai? Jo aapko genuinely aapko revert us tarike se mile. Jo jaisa aap chah rahe hai. Thik hai? Improvement dikhe buyleads ke andar. Ab jo buyleads utha rahe hai kya bol rahe hai aap buyers? Isi liye to aap bol rahe hai ki fake hai wo lead. Aapko aapke expectation ke according revert nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Right?
Executive: To usi chizo pe mujhe clarify karna hai, kaha pe aapko improvement buyleads dikhega. Kaise aapko filter karna hai. Kaise aapko lagega kaha yaha se abhi jo fake lead tha, kaise ye improvement area ki aage ki side jayenge aap.
Executive: Thik hai? Jo proper solution aapko chahiye buyleads se, wo mai aapko aapke sath discuss karne wala hu.
Executive: To aapka meeting schedule karu mai Google Meet par abhi ek bar?
Customer: Abhi aap rehne dijiye meeting kyuki dekho aap jo bol rahe ho na, wo aap, wo chota karne ka bhi aap possible nahi hai kyuki wo aap jo lead de rahe ho wo leads genuinely nahi hai, mai 100% bata raha hu aapko.
Executive: Kya nahi hai?
Customer: Saari leads aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir dekhiye jab tak mai provide nahi karunga resolution aapko nahi showcase karunga to aap kaise keh sakte hai us chiz ko?
Customer: Mai to sir ek mahine se baat hi kar raha hu iske liye aapko.
Executive: To mai sahi bata raha tha aapko. Us time bhi maine aapko bataya jab improvement area ki mai baat kar raha tha nahi kar raha tha aap. Aisa to hai nahi ki pura
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fake buyleads.

- Customer states leads are not genuine.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss buyleads.

- Executive explained how to filter buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer refused the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Negative



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake leads, meeting, improvement
